summary: Personal portfolio website for a Freelance SEO Specialist in Kerala, India, focused on generating SEO inquiries and ranking for target local keywords with a minimal, fast, mobile-first design.
architectural_notes: Tone: professional, honest, junior-friendly, execution-focused (no hype / no fake claims).
Primary SEO targets include: “Freelance SEO Expert in Kerala”, “SEO Specialist in Kerala”.
Design constraints: minimal, fast-loading, mobile-first, avoid heavy animations.

existing_features.title: Create a mobile-first, minimal, fast-loading portfolio website with a white background and clear typography, aligned to a professional, honest, junior-friendly, execution-focused tone (no hype or fake claims).
Implement a lightweight sticky header with top navigation containing exactly 5 items: Home, About, Services, Case Studies, Contact.

Build the main content structure for the 5 navigation destinations (Home, About, Services, Case Studies, Contact) with clear, scannable sections and copy written in English for a Freelance SEO Specialist based in Kerala, India.

Optimize on-page SEO to target local intent keywords including “Freelance SEO Expert in Kerala” and “SEO Specialist in Kerala” through semantic HTML structure (H1/H2), internal linking between sections/pages, and naturally written copy.

Add technical SEO essentials: unique and descriptive title/meta description per page (or per route), canonical URL handling, Open Graph/Twitter metadata, and JSON-LD structured data appropriate for an individual/freelancer service provider in Kerala, India.

Provide lead-generation UX on the Contact destination: a clear call-to-action and an inquiry form that collects at minimum name, email, and message, with basic client-side validation and a confirmation state after submission.

Implement performance best practices suitable for a fast-loading portfolio: minimize heavy dependencies, ensure responsive images if used, and meet a lightweight, mobile-first UI without unnecessary effects.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build an SEO-optimized personal portfolio website for a Freelance SEO Specialist based in Kerala, India, focused on lead generation and ranking for target keywords.
Create a minimal, white-background, fast-loading, mobile-first UI with clear typography and no animation overload.
Implement header/navigation with 5 items (Home, About, Services, Case Studies, Contact) and a lightweight sticky header.
Add a simple contact/inquiry form to the live site to help convert more SEO inquiries.

projectName: SEO-optimized minimal portfolio site for Freelance SEO Specialist (Kerala, India)
